PROPERTY DEVELOPMENT SERVICES

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

EWL Developments is the specialist property development division of EWL which specialises in infrastructure, new build, refurbishment and small-scale renovations of properties and buildings. EWL Developments is managed by three partners, all of whom have more than 20 years’ experience in Finance, Design and Construction of Civil Engineering and Building Projects. Following successful project management of Railway Infrastructure and Property projects EWL has been able to diversify into a Property Developer, and also specialise in re- development of Listed Buildings. We have good relationships with English Heritage, Railway Heritage and Conservation Trusts.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-13.jpg” title_text=”EWL-13″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

EWL CAR PARK DIVISION

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

As a subdivision of our Development team EWL has developed a large portfolio of car parks, helping our clients from inception and feasibility stage to design, construction and operation stage. Our services include the following:

  • Project Management and specialist Car Park advice to all clients.
  • Design, Build, Finance and Operate (DBFO) of car park projects.
  • Specialist Modular Products on each multi storey car park we undertake.
  • Refurbishment of existing car parks.
  • Green/Sustainable /Carbon Free advice.

Details of our full capability statements can be downloaded on the following LINK

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

EWL DEVELOPMENT SERVICES

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

We are able to provide all the essential services required to undertake any successful development project, including but not limited to the following:

  • Identify suitable development sites
  • Prepare development appraisals
  • Prepare financial appraisal
  • Secure funding
  • Manage the development process from start to finish

Details of our full capability statements can be downloaded on the following LINK

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ disabled_on=”on|off|off” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”3.25″ width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” make_fullwidth=”on” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_font=”Amethysta|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.2)” text_font_size=”10vw” text_line_height=”1em” quote_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” custom_margin=”||-0.4em|” custom_padding=”|||” filter_blur=”7px” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_duration=”10000ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation_starting_opacity=”40%” animation_speed_curve=”linear”]

TRANSPORTATION

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″ custom_padding=”||28px|||” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

TRANSPORTATION ADVISORY SERVICES

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

We provide advisory services for the transportation industry. Our team of experts have solid international experience producing due diligence, master plans, transport models, feasibility studies, cost-benefit analysis, safety studies, resilience plans, asset management plans, transport management studies, and any information that infrastructure operators, planners and investors need to maximise their returns.

We can provide expert insights at any stage of the infrastructure development, from concept to commissioning, that will help them make the right decisions. We have a special focus on intelligent mobility and digital transformation of infrastructure systems, and we can advise our clients on the latest technology available

Details of our full capability statements can be downloaded on the following LINK

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-35.jpg” title_text=”EWL-35″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″ custom_padding=”||28px|||” locked=”off” collapsed=”off”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

STRATEGIC ADVICE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

EWL offer our clients informed strategic advice. We believe that our specialist railway team, in particular our high-speed rail experience, gained over the past 50-years gives us the ability to make in-depth, objective and trusted judgements. We continue to advise governments and the rail industry throughout the world on their strategic rail investments.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-39.jpg” title_text=”EWL-39″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-41.jpg” title_text=”EWL-41″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

TRANSPORTATION APPRAISALS, BUSINESS CASES AND FUNDING OPTIONS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Securing the funding and investment for transport solutions require to demonstrate value for money and financial sustainability. For public and private sector projects, value for money is obtained by investing in measures which best meet social, economic and technical requirements which are specific to that project. We provide the strategies, analysis of current problems and opportunities, by demonstrating a fit with policy aims, including risk identification.

Our team includes experts in stakeholder engagement; transport planning, modelling and forecasting; economic, safety, environmental and financial analysis; scheme design technical assessments, costing; and business case preparation.

EWL have been advising Clients and have expertise to help clients secure funding and approvals for a large number of schemes and programmes including Local Sustainable Transport Fund applications, High Speed Rail, National commuter rail networks, major transport schemes, and Metro-link projects.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

PUBLIC TRANSPORT DEVELOPMENT STRATEGIES AND FEASIBILITY SOLUTIONS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Our transport planning and engineering skills are combined on all of our projects to develop evidence based public and private transport development strategies; balancing the requirements of the corridors served, policy goals and costs.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-42.jpg” title_text=”EWL-42″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-43.jpg” title_text=”EWL-43″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

TRANSPORTATION PLANNING

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

We work with country governments, local authorities, regions, districts, cities and to support their aspirations to develop excellent transport networks in order to accommodate the world’s growing populations, support economic vitality and most importantly protect the environment.

Our approaches include stakeholder and public consultation; transport modelling and analysis; capacity analysis, and engineering feasibility, design and costs.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

RAIL SERVICE PLANNING

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Planning a rail service or developing a timetable is fundamental to the preliminary design. We have worked on the development of the French TGV timetable and new line and station studies and franchise bids for train operating companies and also Network Rail.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-44.jpg” title_text=”EWL-44″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-45.jpg” title_text=”EWL-45″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

SCHEME DEVELOPMENT PLANNING AND TRAFFIC ENGINEERING

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Optimal traffic and transport engineering designs improve the efficiency and accessibility of our towns and new developments; and can be essential in securing planning approval. We design transport solutions to meet the needs of all cars, service vehicles, public transport, pedestrians and cyclists.

Our services include estimating trip generation of new developments, junction analysis and design, parking and pick-up/drop-off designs, internal circulation layout, signing strategies and temporary traffic management advice.

Our clients include governments, councils and developers.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

BUILT ASSET OPTIMISATION

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Improving the profitability of a transport business relies on understanding what customers need and how much they are willing to pay; and understanding the demand, cost and revenue implications of an investment.

EWL offer integrated teams with expertise including customer satisfaction surveys, willingness to pay studies, financial analysis, stakeholder engagement, scheme design and cost estimation, modelling and forecasting, risk analysis and business case development.

Our clients include governments, National rail and highway agencies, train operators, toll road concessionaires, and international institutions.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-46.jpg” title_text=”EWL-46″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-50.jpg” title_text=”EWL-50″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

TRANSPORT RESEARCH & SURVEYS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Understanding travel patterns, preferences and behaviour helps transport providers to better provide for transport demand, increase market share and revenues, and meet customer expectations of quality of service.

Our teams have expertise in household and traveller surveys, traffic and passenger count design and analysis, travel time surveys, customer satisfaction surveys, attitudinal studies, and willingness to pay research (including Stated and Revealed Preference).

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

FORECASTING TRANSPORT DEMAND AGAINST CAPACITY MODELLING

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Forecasts of transport demand can be useful for host of applications including developing transport strategies to serve growing populations; tackling congested roads, stations and public transport services; optimising public transport; improving revenues from transport provision; securing financing and funding; designing new infrastructure; assessing and tackling local air quality and noise problems; and reducing the carbon foot-print.

We advise on proportionate approaches and employ a range of modelling techniques including highway and public transport modelling, micro-simulation, variable demand models, pedestrian simulation, and econometric analysis.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-47.jpg” title_text=”EWL-47″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-18-1.jpg” title_text=”EWL-18″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

ENGINEERING & ENVIRONMENT

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

We deliver engineering and environmental expertise for rail schemes that are both feasible and affordable. We have advised a funding partner of Rail Link Engineering Ltd, the project management and engineering team which delivered HS1 on time and within budget. As a member of this consortium we managed the infrastructure design and construction and oversaw the construction of tunnels, bridges and viaducts, rail track and overhead catenary, in-cab signalling, power supplies and state-of-the-art telecommunication systems. Once built, we also managed the detailed programme of testing and commissioning the line.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center”]

FREIGHT & LOGISTICS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Freight services and logistics are essential to economic wellbeing. We assist client to answer questions such as:

  • What freight and logistics infrastructure are required?
  • How to manage the interaction of goods and passenger traffic?
  • How to reduce the environmental impact of transport?
  • What are the financial, social and environmental impacts of potential investments?

Our services include logistic surveys, freight modelling and forecasting, socio-economic and environmental impact appraisals, operational optimisation, and freight infrastructure feasibility studies.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-49.jpg” title_text=”EWL-49″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”footer-ewl(cabecera)” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ bottom_divider_style=”asymmetric2″ bottom_divider_color=”#515553″ global_module=”740″ locked=”off” collapsed=”off”][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”footer-ewl” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”#515553″ min_height=”470px” custom_padding=”27px|||||” global_module=”730″ locked=”off” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ custom_padding=”|||”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-Logo-3-copia.png” title_text=”EWL Logo 3 copia” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_blurb title=”UK” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ header_font=”Amethysta|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”23px” body_font=”Open Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”#a5a5a5″ body_font_size=”17px” body_line_height=”1.3em”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

We have a team of experts in Consultancy & Engineering Services that help our clients covering all the areas related to an airport. We have helped airport and civil aviation authorities, concessionaires, PPP developers, and international development banks.

Our services include due diligence and planning services, airside and landside infrastructure engineering services, terminal and secondary buildings, and special airport systems.

HIGHWAYS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″ custom_padding=”||28px|||” collapsed=”off” admin_label=”Sección”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

HIGHWAYS & ROADS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

EWL International has many years expertise in Highway Engineering both in the U.K. and overseas. We have expertise in Highway and Pavement Design, Traffic Studies, Bridges, Drainage, Geotechnical and Environmental Engineering.

We help our clients with pre-feasibility and feasibility studies, route-location studies, preliminary and detailed design, construction supervision, maintenance studies, traffic modelling, traffic forecasting, economic valuations, cost-benefit analysis, structural analysis and independent engineering check works, inspection and assessment of structures, environmental assessments, waste management services, hydrogeological investigations and studies, hydraulic modelling, geotechnical studies, landslide & slope stabilisations, earthworks, foundation design and retaining structures.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ disabled_on=”on|off|off” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”3.25″ width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” make_fullwidth=”on” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_font=”Amethysta|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.2)” text_font_size=”10vw” text_line_height=”1em” quote_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” custom_margin=”||-0.4em|” custom_padding=”|||” filter_blur=”7px” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_duration=”10000ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation_starting_opacity=”40%” animation_speed_curve=”linear”]

RAILWAYS

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″ custom_padding=”||28px|||” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

RAILWAYS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ custom_padding=”||0px|||”]

Our Rail Division plays a lead role in the consultancy services we provide. We provide design, advisory and project management services covering Civils, Architecture, M&E, Signalling, Electrification & Traction Power, P-Way, Geotechnics, Environmental, Telecommunications, Systems & Safety.

Our experience comprises freight railways, high speed trains, regional and intercity rail, light rail & metro, train and metro stations, re-signalling schemes, depot and maintenance facilities.

Details of our full capability statements can be downloaded on the following LINK

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-36.jpg” title_text=”EWL-36″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″ custom_padding=”||28px|||” locked=”off” collapsed=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

HIGH SPEED TRAINS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

EWL have a team of Technical Specialists who are advising on all engineering aspects of High-Speed Rail projects worldwide and have been assisting Governments with strategic advice and providing them with support in preparing requests for tender proposal documentation. Our team do not possess any allegiance to any of the world’s major suppliers of High-Speed Trains and can therefore provide a truly independent and impartial service to our Clients. EWL have also been advising other technical design teams on the veracity of their solutions as well as reviewing designs from numerous other firms to ensure best practice is obtained on all these projects.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

We are involved in:

  • Infrastructure projects
  • Real estate and construction
  • Design and construction of railways
  • Rolling stock and depots
  • Leasing and financing
  • Planning and environmental issues
  • Health & safety issues
  • DBFOT/PPP/PFI projects

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-18-1.jpg” title_text=”EWL-18″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-19.jpg” title_text=”EWL-19″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

Our rail team has a wealth of expertise in advising on all technical aspects of the rail industry. We act for a spectrum of clients and work together with legal and financial organisations to create tailor made techno-commercial solutions for each High-Speed Rail Clients, – both in the UK and overseas. We have a particular interest in High Speed Rail projects overseas but have also been working on the HS2 project.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″ locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

LIGHT RAPID TRAINST SYSTEMS (LRTs)

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

EWL has played an integral part in the development of Metro, LRV and Trams throughout the World, providing extensive knowledge covering the concept development, pre-project planning, design and implementation of projects. These include the following:

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

  • Metros
  • Monorail
  • Tram-Trains
  • Trams and Light Metros
  • Light Rapid Transit
  • Bus Rapid Transit

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-20.jpg” title_text=”EWL-20″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-22.jpg” title_text=”EWL-22″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_divider color=”#e6e6e6″ divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″ locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

SHORT DISTANCE & COMMUTER TRAINS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

The commuter trains are in response to the need for a means of transport that is fast, safe, profitable and eco-friendly, with the capacity to transport a large number of passengers.

Interior design solutions include a number of seating layouts, cars with cafeteria or vending machine areas, the number of toilets and variable space for luggage and bikes, depending on each customer’s requirements. This range of possibilities provides an outstanding service for end users, who can enjoy the latest innovations in comfort and safety.

Based on the success of the family of low floor trains, this offers customers considerable flexibility, permitting variable configurations in addition to an exterior and interior design tailored to their requirements.

This offers flexible solutions for a closer, environmentally friendly world.

Railway systems that are efficient and eco-friendly can help to improve the competitiveness of the regions.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″ locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-38.jpg” title_text=”EWL-38″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-37.jpg” title_text=”EWL-37″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

EWL is committed to regional development within the rail sector, offering an extensive range of high-performance regional trains that are able to offer some highly competitive traveling times for medium and long-distance services.

Most regional trains are designed with Passenger comfort in mind. All trains feature the very latest safety technology whilst meeting the most exacting interior design specifications, to operate on medium and long-distance routes, day and night.

EWL has a long-standing tradition in the design and supervision of all types of locomotives for different track gauges:

  • Electric locomotives
  • Diesel locomotives

Any locomotives can be fitted with a special bogie system which can run on different track gauges, indistinctly and fulfil the kinematic design requirements have been assessed by EWL.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”footer-ewl(cabecera)” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ bottom_divider_style=”asymmetric2″ bottom_divider_color=”#515553″ global_module=”740″ locked=”off” collapsed=”off”][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”footer-ewl” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”#515553″ min_height=”470px” custom_padding=”27px|||||” global_module=”730″ locked=”off” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ custom_padding=”|||”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-Logo-3-copia.png” title_text=”EWL Logo 3 copia” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_blurb title=”UK” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ header_font=”Amethysta|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”23px” body_font=”Open Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”#a5a5a5″ body_font_size=”17px” body_line_height=”1.3em”]

MANAGEMENT

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″ custom_padding=”||28px|||” collapsed=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

PROJECT & PROGRAMME MANAGEMENT

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

EWL International has a specialist Project & Programme Management Division with the experience and resources to undertake effective project management on behalf of Clients on a wide range of civil engineering and building projects, from scheme identification stage through to commissioning.

Having been involved in so many large multi-disciplinary projects EWL International has built up detailed and efficient systems for organising, planning and costing of any project and for controlling their performance. These systems combined with all of EWL International undisputed design and construction supervision capability in a wide range of multi – disciplinary projects, including civil, structural, environmental and architectural projects makes EWL International eminently capable of providing project management services on any project no matter how large or small, simple or complicated.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-14.jpg” title_text=”EWL-14″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-16.jpg” title_text=”EWL-16″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-15.jpg” title_text=”EWL-15″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ next_background_color=”#515553″ admin_label=”footer-ewl(cabecera)” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ bottom_divider_style=”asymmetric2″ locked=”off” collapsed=”on” global_module=”740″][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”footer-ewl” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”#515553″ min_height=”470px” custom_padding=”27px|||||” locked=”off” collapsed=”on” global_module=”730″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ custom_padding=”|||”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-Logo-3-copia.png” title_text=”EWL Logo 3 copia” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_blurb title=”UK” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ header_font=”Amethysta|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”23px” body_font=”Open Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”#a5a5a5″ body_font_size=”17px” body_line_height=”1.3em”]

[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ next_background_color=”#ffffff” admin_label=”Hero” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#283d4b” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(128,103,79,0.5)” background_color_gradient_direction=”70deg” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-11.jpg” custom_margin=”0%||0%||true|” custom_padding=”3vw|||||” bottom_divider_style=”mountains2″ bottom_divider_height=”20vw” bottom_divider_repeat=”0.5x” bottom_divider_flip=”horizontal|vertical” locked=”off” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ min_height=”209px” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”27px|0px|0|0px|false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” header_font_size=”90px” header_line_height=”1.4em” header_2_font=”Josefin Sans||||||||” header_2_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.6)” header_2_font_size=”32px” header_2_line_height=”1.4em” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”4%” header_font_size_tablet=”50px” header_font_size_phone=”32px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”24px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Who we are

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ disabled_on=”on|off|off” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”3.25″ width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” make_fullwidth=”on” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.2)” text_font_size=”10vw” text_line_height=”1em” quote_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” custom_margin=”||-0.4em|” custom_padding=”|||” filter_blur=”7px” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_duration=”10000ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation_starting_opacity=”40%” animation_speed_curve=”linear” text_font_size_tablet=”124px” text_font_size_phone=”90px” text_font_size_last_edited=”off|desktop”]

WHO WE ARE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″ custom_padding=”||28px|||” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-10.jpg” title_text=”EWL-10″ align=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ max_height=”300px”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”3.29.2″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

INTRODUCTION

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″]

EWL International is a subsidiary of EWL Ltd, we are an Engineering Consultancy Company which specialises in Project Management, Design Management, and Infrastructure & Transportation Advisory Services for our clients outside the United Kingdom.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-06.jpg” title_text=”EWL-06″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-04.jpg” title_text=”EWL-04″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.5″][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-05.jpg” title_text=”EWL-05″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

We provide professional services in Project Management, Design Management, Due Diligence, Independent Audits, Project Reviews, Dispute Resolution for Highways, Railway, Trams & Metros, Water, Airports, Bridges, and Transportation Planning projects.

We have an international purpose, providing services from our headquarters in London to many countries. We have experience in Europe, Middle East, LATAM, North Africa, and Asia.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-07-01-scaled.jpg” title_text=”EWL-07-01″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_divider show_divider=”off” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_divider show_divider=”off” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

CORPORATE VALUES & CSR

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″]

Our values are at the core of everything we do, our behaviour is based on:

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_blurb title=”Sustainable Development” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%234%%” icon_color=”#32a8cc” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ header_font=”Amethysta||||||||” header_font_size=”23px” body_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom”]

We help develop the areas where we work, we help building infrastructure that is sustainable socially, environmentally and economically; creating a positive durable impact in the region for generations to come.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_blurb title=”Integrity” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%267%%” icon_color=”#32a8cc” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ header_font=”Amethysta||||||||” header_font_size=”23px” body_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom”]

Be believe in what we do and develop durable trust with all our stakeholders. We honour our commitments to our clients, employees and future users of the infrastructure that we build.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_blurb title=”Collaboration” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%259%%” icon_color=”#32a8cc” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ header_font=”Amethysta||||||||” header_font_size=”23px” body_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom”]

We believe that we are greater than the sum of our parts. We create synergies with our clients and stakeholders to exceed expectations in all our activities, involving everyone and proactively seeking different points of view. Together we create transportation infrastructure.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blurb title=”Quality” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%202%%” icon_color=”#32a8cc” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ header_font=”Amethysta||||||||” header_font_size=”23px” body_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom”]

We provide exceptional quality in the services we deliver. Quality is of the essence for all the other values to acquire meaning, by providing a quality service to our clients we serve our society and leave a durable legacy behind us.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-09.jpg” title_text=”EWL-09″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ text_font=”Amethysta|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#32a8cc” text_font_size=”30px” text_orientation=”center”]

OUR TEAM

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”]

EWL International is managed by experienced partners, all of them with many years of experience in Design and Construction of Civil Engineering Projects, Building Projects and Project Finance. EWL has its own personnel specialising in Project Management, Design Management, Construction Management, and Project Finance. The solid experience of our team ensures a quality service to our clients, adding value in all phases of the project.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_team_member name=”Amit Sen” position=”Managing Partner” image_url=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-03-copia.jpg” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_font=”Amethysta||||on||||” header_text_color=”#32a8cc” position_font=”||on|on|||||” position_font_size=”18px”]

Amit has over 35 years of experience in Project Management, Engineering Management, Bid Management, project scheme selection, feasibility studies, design management detailed design, construction management, construction, site supervision and testing and commissioning of major Railways and Highway projects in the United Kingdom.

Amit is a Chartered Civil Engineer. He is well versed in all aspects of current developments in the management and control of large multi-disciplinary civil engineering, property development and building projects and was employed by Railtrack/Network Rail and Stagecoach Rail (TOC) where he has been extensively involved in liaison with DfT and many Client Organisations, Contractors, and Consultants, and establishing sound working relationships. He is also well versed in modern engineering, commercial and project management concepts.

[/et_pb_team_member][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_team_member name=”Daniel Delgado” position=”Project & Programme Management Partner” image_url=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-02.jpg” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_font=”Amethysta||||on||||” header_text_color=”#32a8cc” position_font=”||on|on|||||” position_font_size=”18px”]

Daniel has 20 years of experience in the civil engineering industry in diverse roles that comprise design, construction and project & programme management. Qualified Project Manager (PMP, US) and Chartered in 4 countries (UK, Ireland, Spain, Portugal), Daniel has a varied international experience having worked in large infrastructure projects in the UK, Ireland, Portugal, Spain, France, US, Canada, Peru, Paraguay, and Saudi Arabia.

For the last 7 years Daniel has been working in large rail projects in the UK for Network Rail, Transport for London, and other clients as technical advisor, engineering manager (CEM), lead designer (CRE), and project & programme manager. Relevant rail projects include CrossRail, HS2, 4 Lines Modernisation, Dover Sea Wall Reconstruction, West Anglia Main Line Capacity Enhancement, Ottawa & Toronto Light Rails, Sheffield Tram Train, Riyadh Metro, Great Western Route Modernisation (electrification), Gatwick Airport Train Station Development, Bath Corridor Stations Refurbishment, among many others.

[/et_pb_team_member][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_team_member name=”Manesh Kumar” position=”Senior partner” image_url=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-01-copia.jpg” content_tablet=”

Manesh is a global transport infrastructure board executive with overall responsibility for strategic growth and excellence for EWL international. A professional engineer with management degree in management, Manesh has led large global international firms prior to setting up EWL international in 2010 with other partners. Manesh Kumar has worked with Jacobs and other major internal firms prior to EWL international.

Manesh also has over 35 years of experience in leading and managing major international projects in the US, Australia and Middle East.

Manesh is a global transport infrastructure board executive with overall responsibility for strategic growth and excellence for EWL international. A professional engineer with management degree in management, Manesh has led large global international firms prior to setting up EWL international in 2010 with other partners. Manesh Kumar has worked with Jacobs and other major internal firms prior to EWL international.

Manesh also has over 35 years of experience in leading and managing major international projects in the US, Australia and Middle East.

Organisation Chart

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-Organisation-Chart_Mesa-de-trabajo-1-scaled.jpg” title_text=”EWL-Organisation-Chart_Mesa de trabajo 1″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”footer-ewl(cabecera)” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ bottom_divider_style=”asymmetric2″ bottom_divider_color=”#515553″ global_module=”740″ locked=”off” collapsed=”off”][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”footer-ewl” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”#515553″ min_height=”470px” custom_padding=”27px|||||” global_module=”730″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ custom_padding=”|||”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-Logo-3-copia.png” title_text=”EWL Logo 3 copia” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_blurb title=”UK” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ header_font=”Amethysta|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”23px” body_font=”Open Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”#a5a5a5″ body_font_size=”17px” body_line_height=”1.3em”]
